attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, demand an end to all forms of violence against women and children. We call upon all political parties to develop a fully resourced national strategy which enables women and children to live lives free from the threat of violence. Such a strategy must incorporate the demands of the Million Women Rise movement.

We also demand that International Women's Day is declared a public holiday in recognition of the achievements and contribution of women worldwide.
